//new model, different name
//rename class name to other class that is being autogenerated
//files will be combined if set partial

namespace Db.Models

{
[MetadataType(typeof(MovieMetaData))]
public partial class Movie
{
public class MovieMetaData
{
[DisplayName("Whatever")]
public string WhateverThisPropertyIs {get;set;}
}
}
}

//notes on aggregating
